Actions.Name: Hamstring
Actions.Effects: On hit, until the end of their next turn, foe takes 2 damage for each space they move.

Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 3 takes [fray] damage, ignoring vigor. If they are bloodied, they take [fray] damage twice instead, ignoring vigor.

Actions.Name: Terrorize
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 4 must save or become blinded+ and gains +1 curse on all attacks and saves until it ends a turn adjacent to an ally. On a successful save, they are only blinded. Blinded or Bloodied foes fail the save.

Actions.Name: Arc Whip
Actions.Effects: A character in range 4 must save or become slowed and electrified. Electrified characters take [fray] damage.
